name: neocircuits
description:
neocircuits is a short and simple match 3 puzzle game set on a distant moon. This is more of a proof of concept than anything, so there isn't much innovation in terms of gameplay; however, it is written entirely in Batch, plus a bit of VBScript for music.

FEATURES

  • 6 puzzles
  • Storyline
  • DOS style - character based graphics and commandline gameplay
  • Soviet-wave Soundtrack

Unfortunately, this game is Windows 10 only, since it uses VT100 escape sequences.
